unnormalised: Seems like our municipal corporations are finally waking up! From Mumbai to Manipur, innovative waste management strategies are being implemented. For instance, IIT Delhi is piloting a project using microorganisms to break down organic waste faster, cutting down composting time by a whopping 40%!

unnormalised: Speaking of organic waste, remember all those leftover laddoos after Diwali?
